title: 崩溃哦~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
author: 世界破坏者
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I just don't know what went wrong :(

Description: Ticking memory connection

求解!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.author: SPE__HaiKuo
replies.txt_content:
内存爆了=
才分配了313M……
给多点内存给MC吧'_>'
